name: brain-migrate
description: Migrate existing documentation into Quack Brain v2 format (documentation/ + guide/) with automatic classification, Mermaid diagram conversion, and CLAUDE.md integration.
longDescription:
Brain Migrate automates the conversion of any project's existing documentation into the Quack Brain v2 structure.

It scans multiple source locations (.quack/brain/, .claude/docs/, loose markdown, docs/ folders), classifies each file by type (bug fix, pattern, decision, gotcha, guide), determines audience (AI vs human), and presents a migration plan before executing.

Key features:
- Automatic type classification based on filenames, frontmatter, and content
- Human guide detection and conversion with beginner-friendly writing style
- Mermaid diagram (.mmd) support â€” converts existing diagrams to Mermaid format
- CLAUDE.md Knowledge Base section auto-update
- Safe migration with user approval at each step
- Inbox safety net for unclassifiable files

Requires the quack-brain plugin for the target structure definition.
